inclusion.criterion: suffering from arthritis of the shoulder or frozen shoulder
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: difference between pain score prior to treatment and that when given questionnaire averaged 5.36 points over 10 with a standard deviation of 3.28
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: random allocation of patients, and study groups
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of abdominal pain and vomiting. He drinks around 60 units of alcohol per week and smokes 22 cigarettes per day.
